Title: Provides for window tinting standards for motor vehicles and makes an appropriation therefor
Summary: Provides for window tinting standards on rear side windows of all motor vehicles in New York State and appropriates $50,000 therefor for the general purpose of enabling the superintendent of state police to purchase window tint meters necessary to carry out the provisions of this act.
LawCode: Amd ยง375, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to tinting on motor vehicle windows and making an appropriation therefor
